hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Maslamah said:"I heard 'Abdul-'Aziz - that is, bin Asid At-Tahi from Al-Basrah - say: 'Ibn Az-Zubair was asked about soaking (fruits) in earthenware jars and he said: "The Messenger of Allah [SAW] forbade us from that

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ نَبِيذِ الْجَرِّ، مُفْرَدًا
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of Soaking (Making Nabidh) in Earthenware Jars
